SELECT x.id,x.bt_trade_amount,x.bt_trade_status,x.bt_trade_type,x.bt_application_start_date FROM ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT( bt.bt_application_start_date, "%Y-%m-%d " ) a , bt.id, bt.bt_user_id userId FROM sps_bank_trade_info bt GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT( bt.bt_application_start_date, "%Y-%m-%d %H" ) ) b JOIN sps_bank_trade_info x ON b.a =DATE_FORMAT( x.bt_application_start_date, "%Y-%m-%d " ) WHERE x.bt_user_id=#{userId}
order by b.a DESC

SELECT bt_trade_amount, bt_trade_after_balanc, recharge_status, bt_trade_status, bt_trade_type, bt_income_type, bt_expenditure_type, bt_trade_no, bt_payment_date, standby1, standby2, bank_card_name, bank_card_number FROM sps_bank_trade_info WHERE id=#{id}

SELECT tr.id, tr.bt_trade_amount, tr.bt_trade_status, tr.bt_trade_type, tr.bt_application_start_date, tr.recharge_status, CONCAT(REPLACE(DATE_FORMAT( tr.bt_application_start_date,"%Y-%m"),'-','年'),'月') AS dateDesc, tr.bank_card_name, tr.bank_card_number, tr.bt_income_type, tr.bt_expenditure_type FROM sps_bank_trade_info tr WHERE tr.bt_trade_name =#{constomeId} AND tr.bt_application_start_date > DATE_SUB(NOW(),INTERVAL 2 MONTH) ORDER BY tr.bt_application_start_date DESC
